required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Reconstruction of Upper Eyelid With a Newly Modified Cutler-Beard Technique With Tarsoconjunctival Graf
clinical_study.official_title: Reconstruction of Upper Eyelid Defects Secondary to Malignant Tumors With a Newly Modified Cutler-Beard Technique With Tarsoconjunctival Graft

brief_summary.textblock: To study the results of a modified Cutler-Beard technique , using a contralateral tarsoconjunctival graft, in patients who underwent excision of large malignant tumors of the upper eyelid

detailed_description.textblock:
A tarsoconjunctival graft was harvested from the contralateral upper eyelid, with an extra 3 mm of conjunctiva from the superior edge of tarsus and was attached to the upper eyelid defect, differently than previously described.
Functional, cosmetic outcomes and postoperative complications were evaluated.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Retrospective review of charts of the patients enrolled

secondary_outcome.measure: Retraction of the donor lower eyelid

secondary_outcome.description: Excessive aperture of the eyelids, in mm
Number of complications, being 0 the best result

other_outcome.description: Number of symptoms referred by the patient, being 0 the best result

arm_group.description: Reconstruction of Upper Eyelid With a Newly Modified Cutler-Beard Technique With Tarsoconjunctival Graf

intervention.description: A tarsoconjunctival graft was harvested from the contralateral upper eyelid, with an extra 3 mm of conjunctiva from the superior edge of tarsus and was attached to the upper eyelid defect, differently than previously described.
intervention.other_name: Modified Cutler-Beard technique with tarsoconjunctival graft

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Upper eyelid defect after tumor resection
Exclusion Criteria:
- previous surgery

overall_official.affiliation: Hospital Universitario 12 de Octubre, Madrid, Spain

patient_data.ipd_description: Publication of the results in a journal
